arts.ttl: Man United consider exercising £15m buy-back option on Alvaro Fernandez as club struggle to agree fee with Lecce for top target Patrick Dorgu
arts.sum: Manchester United are weighing up whether to exercise their buy-back clause for Alvaro Fernandez at Benfica if they can't agree a fee for Lecce's Patrick Dorgu.

arts.ttl: Sevilla star speaks out on potential Aston Villa move
arts.sum: Sevilla star Loïc Badé has on Saturday spoken out on the ongoing speculation linking him with a move to the Premier League, with Aston Villa. The name of defender Badé…

arts.ttl: Liverpool, PSG €60M-Rated Target Won’t Leave in January Despite Aston Villa Rumors
arts.sum: Sevilla’s Loïc Badé has been turning heads with his standout performances, especially after impressing for France at the Summer Olympics. With Milan Skriniar now at Fenerbahçe SK, Paris Saint-Germain may be on the lookout for a new center-back, either in January or next summer.
